import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Metadata for All Integrations</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/integration/name"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns the metadata for your integrations filtered by type.  

This request supports integrations with only the following:

 * Okta
 * Qualys
 * Tenable 


## Request

successful operation

invalid_integration_type / internal_error
